peril.model.combat

Class CombatHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.combat.CombatHelper

  • public final class CombatHelper
extends java.util.Observable
    Helps the game by performing a round of combat denoted by a CombatRound passed to fight(CombatRound). The results of this round of combat can are view.
    Since:
    2018-03-11
    Version:
    1.01.09
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Observable, CombatRound, CombatView, ModelSquad, ModelSquadMember

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_ATTACK_SQUAD_SIZE
      The maximum size of an attacking squad.
      static int MAX_DEFEND_SQUAD_SIZE
      The maximum size of an defending squad.
      CombatView view
      The CombatView that denotes the results of the previous round of combat.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      CombatHelper(GameController game)
      Constructs an new CombatHelper.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CombatHelper

        public CombatHelper(GameController game)
        Constructs an new CombatHelper.
        Parameters:
        game - The GameController that allows this CombatHelper to query the state of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • fight

        public void fight(CombatRound round)
        Performs a round of combat between the ModelCountrys and ModelSquads defined by the parameter CombatRound. The results of this CombatRound will be stored in view until the CombatHelper is clear() or the next fight(CombatRound).
        Parameters:
        round - The CombatRound specifying the details of this fight.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears this CombatHelper.

      • getTotalAliveUnits

        public int getTotalAliveUnits(ModelArmy army,
                              ModelSquad squad)
        Retrieves the total number of alive ModelUnits when the specified ModelArmy and the ModelSquad.
        Parameters:
        army - The ModelArmy to be combined.
        squad - The ModelSquad to be combined.
        Returns:
        The total number of alive ModelUnits.
